name: Simon Dupree
teaser: Improving social and environmental conditions through the use of technology is Simon's vision.
bio: Having studied and worked in natural resource management and data science he has determined work towards improving social and environmental conditions through the use of technology. Having recently graduated from Founders and Coders Simon is very eager to use his software development skills within Yalla. Experience with Node, React, Express, SQL, MongoDB.

name: Ramy Shurafa
bio: Studied and worked in civil engineering and GIS before deciding to follow his passion and to join Gaza Sky Geeks in cooperation with Founders and Coders. Likes logical thinking and problem-solving, enjoys challenges and self-improvement. Experience in Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, React.js.
